fr.sii.ogham.assertion

Class OghamInternalAssertions

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.assertion.OghamInternalAssertions

  • public class OghamInternalAssertions
extends Object
    Utility class used by Ogham for testing result of MessagingService configuration.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Method Detail

      • assertThat

        public static MessagingServiceAssertions assertThat(MessagingService service)
        Entry point to write assertions on MessagingService instance. For example: 
         
 OghamInternalAssertions
   .assertThat(messagingService)
     .sendGrid()
       .apiKey(equalTo("bar"))
       .client(allOf(isA(SendGrid.class), not(isSpringBeanInstance(context, SendGrid.class))))
       .and()
     .thymeleaf()
 		 .all()
         .engine(isA(TemplateEngine.class))
         .and()
       .and()
     .freemarker()
       .all()
         .configuration()
           .defaultEncoding(equalTo(StandardCharsets.US_ASCII.name()));
        Parameters:
        service - the service to make assertions with
        Returns:
        builder for fluent assertions on messaging service

      • isSpringBeanInstance

        public static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> isSpringBeanInstance(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context,
                                                               Class<?> beanClass)
        Ensure that provided object is the same instance as the bean available in Spring context.

        If no bean is declared, then it will fail.

        If a bean is declared but not same instance, then it will fail.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the expected object
        Parameters:
        context - the Spring context (used to retrieve bean instance)
        beanClass - the class of the bean to match
        Returns:
        the matcher
